original_title: เปิงมาง กลองผีหนังมนุษย์
overview: Ping, a young nobleman, has retired from the service of the crown in order to become a musician. He becomes a student of Master Duang, a famous musician. Master Duang owns a mysterious drum called Perng Mang, which has the power to bring success or death to people.
tagline: This instrument is made from human skin.
title: The Haunted Drum
